sessions.title: PD Team: Training
sessions.description: This time is dedicated to providing training on some advanced courses in the morning and support for new ESMs learning the Intro Training in the afternoon. It will also be a time for the PD team to develop supporting resources for ESMs.
sessions.location: 8AM-12PM in Gentoo at MIND HQ and 1PM-4PM in Magellanic at MIND HQ

sessions.title: Finance Team Building Activity
sessions.description: Finance - get ready to be trapped in a room with your team!
sessions.location: Escape X Rooms (17981 Sky Park Cir Suite H, Irvine, CA 92614)

sessions.title: MINDShare 2018 Kick-off Event!
sessions.description: Join us at the Irvine office courtyard at 5:00 p.m. for a picnic with games and refreshments. The In-N-Out truck will start serving dinner at 6:00 p.m. and the JiJi Band will be making a special appearance. (Family welcome.) Local folks – bring your picnic blankets and lawn chairs!

sessions.title: Breakfast for Ayres hotel guests at Restaurant Le Chateau
sessions.description: Breakfast will be served in Restaurant Le Chateau at the Ayres for hotel guests.

sessions.title: Check in at Registration Table
sessions.description: Check in and pick up your shirts from the Registration Table in the Ayres courtyard.

sessions.title: The Charm & Hammer Show
sessions.description: Celebrate MIND's fascinating 20-year history with Karin Wu and Kevin Hammer hosting your soon-to-be favorite talk show!  Special guests will explore the evolution of our mission, brand, product, roles, and much more!

sessions.title: Looking to the Future
sessions.description: Hear about MIND's plans for the future and the direction we're going in before we experience some of the innovative products and enhancements we have to look forward to.
sessions.organizer: Brett Woudenberg, Matt Feldmann & Paul Blair

sessions.title: Looking to the Future Part Two
sessions.description: Expanding on MIND's plans for the future, we reconvene this session to experience some innovative products and enhancements we have to look forward to. (Bring your laptops.)
sessions.organizer: Brandon Smith, Ki Karou & Erich Zeller, Matthew Peterson

sessions.title: 3:45 PM Busses Depart for the beach from Ayres Lobby
sessions.organizer: After the last session, quickly drop off your belongings in your rooms and head to the lobby to board the busses! Busses depart on time, with or without you.

sessions.title: Beach Dinner at Crystal Cove
sessions.description: Celebrate MIND's 20th Anniversary on the sand with sliders and s'mores! Busses will take you round trip - be ready to depart from Ayres Hotel at 3:50 p.m. and return at 7:30 p.m. Wear comfortable shoes for the 15-minute walk through the Crystal Cove State Park. For those that are not able to make the walk, bring $3 cash to use the Beachcomber shuttle for $1.50 each way. You can have your shuttle fares reimbursed via expense report after MINDShare.

sessions.title: Breakfast for Ayres hotel guests at Restaurant Le Chateau
sessions.description: Breakfast will be served in Restaurant Le Chateau at the Ayres for hotel guests.

sessions.title: Check in at Registration Table
sessions.description: If you haven't already, be sure to check in and pick up your shirts from the Registration Table in the Ayres courtyard.

sessions.title: Welcome
sessions.description: Come and hear about today’s theme: People. Learn how we are working together to support our customers, our donors and each other.

sessions.title: The People of MIND: A Journey with JiJi
sessions.description: Travel with JiJi on an adventure through the customer journey. On this trip we'll explore how the customer journey flows and how each department impacts the experience.

sessions.title: The People of MIND: A Journey with JiJi Part 2
sessions.description: Travel with JiJi on an adventure through the customer journey. On this trip we'll explore how the customer journey flows and how each department impacts the experience.

sessions.title: How MIND Fits in the EdTech Space
sessions.description: ST Math is not your average EdTech program. Learn what makes us different from our competitors and how we can break schemas of what instructional software "should be."

sessions.title: How MIND fits into Education
sessions.description: How does MIND impact mathematics education? Discover how our programs and approach connect with and transform the teaching and learning of mathematics. This session will be recorded.
sessions.organizer: Twana Young, Brian Coffey & special guest Anne Oberjuerge

sessions.title: Core Values Panel
sessions.description: Join in a discussion around diversity and inclusion as part of shaping our core values and company culture.
sessions.organizer: Karin Wu, James Masterson, Aram Gonzalez, Nina Wu and special guest Gloria Montiel

sessions.title: Tacos & Trivia at Acapulco
sessions.description: Fancy yourself a sports fanatic or pop culture connoisseur? Tonight, we put our collective knowledge to use! Walk over to Acapulco and join us on their patio for margaritas, tacos and trivia. The restaurant is walking distance from the hotel, however Ayres will provide a shuttle as well. For those interested, please be ready and waiting in the lobby by 4:45 p.m. for a 4:50 p.m. departure.
sessions.location: Acapulco (1262 Bristol St, Costa Mesa, CA 92626)

sessions.title: Breakfast for Ayres hotel guests at Restaurant Le Chateau
sessions.description: Breakfast will be served in Restaurant Le Chateau at the Ayres for hotel guests.

sessions.title: Yoga
sessions.description: Join Danette for a guided morning Yoga session by the Suites Pool Area. Please bring your own towels for yoga on the pool deck if you do not have a mat.

sessions.title: Welcome
sessions.description: Come and hear about today’s theme: Passion. We are all here because we love this work come and learn how what we do makes a difference.

sessions.title: Cross-functional Collaboration: Education Success, Education Partnerships and Engagement
sessions.organizer: Jim Lund, Brian Molitor, Karin Wu
sessions.description: Passion fuels us, and a clear understanding of our responsibilities ensures we orchestrate an effective and efficient customer experience. We will discuss a responsibility framework, clarify communication, and outline action items to make sure we are delivering value to our schools and districts.

sessions.title: Departmental Session: ESM Training
sessions.description: Time to get tactical with Education Success. We will discuss PD changes, Implementation enhancements, and begin our FY19 segmentation strategy

sessions.title: Closing Remarks
sessions.description: Concluding MINDShare 2018: MINDmatters

sessions.title: Finance: Dinner at North Italia
sessions.description: Dinner at North Italia at 6:00 PM
sessions.location: North Italia (2957 Michelson Dr, Irvine, CA 92612)

sessions.title: Partnerships & Social Impact: Dinner at Cucina Enoteca
sessions.description: Dinner at Cucina Enoteca, Newport Beach at 6:00 PM
sessions.location: Cucina Enoteca at Fashion Island (951 Newport Center Dr, Newport Beach, CA 92660)

sessions.title: Engineering, Product, Data & Engagement: Games & Dinner in the Annex

sessions.location: Annex at MIND Irvine Offices (111 Academy, Irvine CA 92617)

sessions.title: Ed Success: Explore the OC in Small Groups!
sessions.description: Explore the OC in Small Groups! Please discuss various options with your managers.
